Class JYSwitchButton

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JToggleButton
                      javax.swing.JCheckBox
                          de.javasoft.swing.JYSwitchButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIPropertySupport, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class JYSwitchButton
extends javax.swing.JCheckBox
implements IUIPropertySupport

A checkBox variant including a switchable On/Off text area.

Version:
1.04, 17.06.2010
See Also:
Serialized Form
